question: Show Spanish-speaking pilots and gate agents.
sql_query1:
SELECT Gate_Agents.name
FROM Gate_Agents
WHERE Gate_Agents.Language = "Spanish"
UNION
SELECT Pilots.name
FROM Pilots
WHERE Pilots.Language = "Spanish"
sql_query2:
SELECT Gate_Agents.name
FROM Gate_Agents
UNION
SELECT Pilots.name
FROM Pilots
WHERE Pilots.Language = "Spanish"
interpretation1: Show both the Spanish-speaking gate agents and pilots.
interpretation2: Show all the gate agents and just the Spanish-speaking pilots.
